thread.title: Kaspersky Antivirus Fixes Bug That Allowed Attackers to Block Windows Update and Others Services
thread.title_full: Kaspersky Antivirus Fixes Bug That Allowed Attackers to Block Windows Update and Others Services - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Kaspersky Antivirus Fixes Bug That Allowed Attackers to Block Windows Update and Others Services
text: A vulnerability that allowed easy abuse by attackers was discovered and quickly fixed in the Kaspersky Internet Security antivirus package, one which allowed hackers to spoof traffic and use the antivirus product against the user and itself. Google Project Zero security researcher Tavis Ormandy is on a roll these days, finding zero-day exploits in the same Â»
